content: vernon planter cover crochet pattern by wavelengths vernon planter cover thank you for choosing the vernon planter cover pattern i d love to see what colour palette you come up with feel free to share your wips and finished planter covers on instagram tagging @_wavelengths and/or #vernonplantercover please don t sell or claim this pattern as your own supplies & materials yarn yarn weight - size 4 worsted/aran recommend using cotton yarn suggested yarn - check out what worsted/aran yarns lovecrafts has to offer by clicking here amount of yarn based on the pattern below you ll need approx 186 yards / 170 metres of cotton yarn make sure to adjust if you re planning to make it bigger this is a great stash busting project is you ve got extra bits of cotton worsted/aran yarn around hooks if you are a tighter crocheter i recommend using a 4 5mm hook if you are a looser crocheter i recommend using 3 5mm or 4mm hook other - tapestry needle to weave ends in - a 4 1/2 / 11 cm terracotta dish or whichever size you d like adjust pattern accordingly see below video i ve put together a video tutorial for this pattern might be helpful to have that additional visual you can find the video by clicking here if you ve got this printed the video tutorial is available on my youtube page wavelengths or try searching vernon planter cover on youtube notes the pattern is easily adjustable to accomodate different sized dishes simply reduce the number of row in the base section to make it smaller or continue the sequence to make it bigger if making adjustments always make sure that when you start the wall section that you for a row back loop only blo this will give it the proper structure 1 vernon planter cover gauge in single_crochet with the correct hook size to meet gauge hook size suggestions above 19 single_crochet x 21 row = 4 x 4 / 10cm x 10cm square gauge isn t too important here as long as the diametre of your base is slightly larger than the size of your terracotta dish you re good to go stitches us terms single_crochet -
